title: Boris Johnson – 2020 Statement in the House of Commons on Winter Plan
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, in the House of Commons on 1 December 2020.
content:
Mr Speaker, I beg to move that these Regulations now be approved.
